comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: All the photos in this series at City College are likely from the reception for Nobel Prize winner as noted elsewhere here. Taft attended a reception at City College in New York for Dr Alexis Carrel, who had won the Nobel Prize for medicine in 1912. The event took place on on ,Nov 16, 1912. Article from NYTimes describing the event honoring Dr. Carrel: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9B07E5DE1E3AE633A... Wikipedia article about City College and some photos of old buidings en.wikipedia.org/wiki/City_College_of_New_York
